verses.roman:
ataeva jarad-gava māre muni-gaṇa
veda-mantre siddha kare tāhāra jīvana

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; jarad-gava—old cows; māre—killed; muni-gaṇa—sages; veda-mantre—by the power of Vedic hymns; siddha—rejuvenated; kare—makes; tāhāra—his; jīvana—life.
translation: "Therefore the great sages sometimes killed old cows, and by chanting Vedic hymns they again brought them to life for perfection.
